ygData.subject: Interesting Charm tidbit
ygData.msgSnippet: I found this on the new Bug board on the Sony site, I wonder if this applies to bards as well.... _Hobart_ Station Member   posted 07-13-2000 02:43 PM ... Ok,
ygData.messageBody:
I found this on the new Bug board on the Sony site, I wonder if this applies
to bards as well....

_Hobart_
Station Member posted 07-13-2000 02:43 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Ok, for the post 50 charm line of spells.
They work different on Kunark then they do on Norrath. They are made so you
cannot charm creatures higher then level 52 on Norrath. They do however work
on much higher creatures in Kunark. That's all the info I can provide.

Hobart

This is NOT a bug
